answerText: zinc fingers[10] Zinc fingers can be used in artificial versions of these proteins that cut  the phosphodiester bonds of DNA. Restriction enzymes are examples of the endo type.

question: Question: Some form of this protein motif is known as the Treble-clef and Gag-knuckle. For 10 points each: [10] Name these motifs whose most common form is made of two cysteine and two histidine residues.
